categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Maggie was a former Human female Imperial who defected and joined the Alliance of Free Planets as a pilot and officer during the Galactic Civil War.

Maggie served as both a starfighter pilot and a soldier during the Nagai–Tof War. Shortly after the Battle of Endor, she traveled to the planet Godo to investigate a strange plague that was affecting the native inhabitants. Later, she was part of a small team sent to infiltrate the Tof base on Saijo during the last battle of the war.
